attributes.comment:
I am writing regarding Docket #USCIS-2006-0044 and the proposed fee increases.
Please reconsider the increase in these fees. Of specific interest to me is the
proposed increase in the I-600A fee and the fee for fingerprints. My wife and I are
trying to adopt internationally, and the expense is already prohibitive enough
without the added expense of the proposed fee increase. I know many other
families that are in the adoption process feel the same way. If a fee increase is
imminent, at least consider the idea of grandfathering I-600A application and
fingerprint fees that have already been submitted and logged in prior to the fee
increase. To ask for extra fees from people that have already submitted fees under
the current fee structure is not acceptable.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Brian K. Welborn
